text: وَلَمَّا بَلَغَ أَشُدَّهُۥ وَٱسْتَوَىٰٓ ءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ حُكْمًا وَعِلْمًا ۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِى ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ

translation.en.sahih: And when he attained his full strength and was [mentally] mature, We bestowed upon him judgement and knowledge. And thus do We reward the doers of good.
translation.id.indonesian: Dan setelah Musa cukup umur dan sempurna akalnya, Kami berikan kepadanya hikmah (kenabian) dan pengetahuan. Dan demikianlah Kami memberi balasan kepada orang-orang yang berbuat baik.
